mapper.select: SELECT A.post_name FROM sys_post A LEFT JOIN sys_user_post B ON A.id = B.post_id LEFT JOIN sys_user C ON B.user_id = C.id WHERE C.user_name = #{userName} ORDER BY A.post_sort ASC
SELECT A.role_name FROM sys_role A LEFT JOIN sys_user_role B ON A.id = B.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user C ON B.user_id = C.id WHERE C.user_name = #{userName} ORDER BY A.role_sort ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sys_user A LEFT JOIN sys_dept B ON A.dept_id = B.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role C ON A.id = C.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role D ON C.role_id = D.id

SELECT A.id,A.dept_id,A.user_name,A.nick_name,A.email,A.phonenumber,A.create_time FROM sys_user A LEFT JOIN sys_dept B ON A.dept_id = B.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role C ON A.id = C.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role D ON C.role_id = D.id
LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
